collection_name_tooltip1: Enter a Name that best identifies your collection.
collection_name_tooltip2: The displayed Name is optimized in for your database and saved as shown under Database Name
collection_icon_tooltip: Choose an icon to represent this collection in the interface
collection_permission_helper1: Define User Permissions to allow access
collection_slug_tooltip: Customize your collection slug if a different URL is required
collection_status_tooltip: Define how your collection status will be saved by default
collection_widgetfield_addrequired: Add your required widget field to create your

databaseConfig_DB_HOST_helper: Specify the database host (e.g., 'localhost' or an IP address).
databaseConfig_DB_NAME_helper: Provide the name of the database to connect to.
databaseConfig_DB_PASSWORD_helper: Enter the password for the database connection, if required.
databaseConfig_DB_RETRY_ATTEMPTS_helper: Set the number of retry attempts for connecting to the database.
databaseConfig_DB_RETRY_DELAY_helper: Set the delay (in milliseconds) between retry attempts.
databaseConfig_DB_Type_helper: Define the type of database (e.g., 'mongodb' or 'mariadb').
databaseConfig_DB_USER_helper: Enter the username for the database connection, if required.
databaseConfig_description: Database settings including type, host, name, user credentials, and connection pool details.
databaseConfig_MULTI_TENANT_helper: Enable multi-tenant mode to allow multiple isolated organizations to use the same CMS instance.
delete_entry_no_selection_error: Cannot delete: No entry is selected.
emailConfig_description: SMTP server settings for email notifications.
emailConfig_SMTP_EMAIL_helper: Provide the email address to use for sending emails.
emailConfig_SMTP_HOST_helper: Enter the SMTP server host for sending emails.
emailConfig_SMTP_PASSWORD_helper: Enter the password for the email account.
emailConfig_SMTP_PORT_helper: Enter the SMTP server port (default is 587).
error_wrong: We are sorry, something went wrong.
formSchemas_Emailvalid: Email must be a valid email
formSchemas_PasswordMessage: Password must be a minimum of {passwordStrength} characters & contain at least one letter, one number, and one special character
formSchemas_username_min: Name must be at least 2 characters
formSchemas_usernameregex: Name can only contain letters, digits and @$!%*#
googleConfig_description: Google OAuth and API key settings.
googleConfig_GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET_helper: Enter the Google Client Secret for OAuth.
googleConfig_GOOGLE_CIENT_ID_helper: Enter the Google Client ID for OAuth.
googleConfig_GOOGLE_OAUTH_helper: Enable or disable Google OAuth for authentication.
languageConfig_AVAILABLE_CONTENT_LANGUAG: The available languages for the site (default: 'en').
languageConfig_AVAILABLE_SYSTEM_LANGUAGE: The available languages for the user interface (default: 'en').
languageConfig_DEFAULT_CONTENT_LANGUAGE_: The default language for the site (default: 'en').
languageConfig_DEFAULT_SYSTEM_LANGUAGE_h: The default language for the user interface (default: 'en').
languageConfig_description: Language-related interface and content language settings.
llmConfig_llmProvider: LLM Provider (e.g., OpenAI, Claude, Gemimi, etc)
login_demo_message: This site will reset every 10 min.
manage_content_widgets_description: Manage content widgets and marketplace integrations
mapboxConfig_description: Mapbox API token for map services.
mapboxConfig_USE_MAPBOX_helper: Enable or disable Mapbox for map services.
mediaConfig_IMAGE_SIZE_helper: The sizes of images that the site will generate.
mediaConfig_MEDIA_FOLDER_helper: The folder where the site's media files will be stored. (default: 'mediaFiles')
mediaConfig_MEDIA_OUTPUT_FORMAT_QUALITY_: Format and quality settings for media files. (default: format: 'original', quality: 80)
mediaConfig_MEDIASERVER_URL_helper: The URL of the media server. (default is localhost as: '')
modaledit_avatarfilesallowed: PNG, JPEG, GIF, SVG, WEBP, AVIF allowed.
modaledit_avatarfilesize: File size must be less than 5MB
modaledit_avatarunsupported: Supported formats: jpeg, jpg, png, webp, avif, svg, gif
multibuttontoken_blockbody: Are you sure you wish to block this Token?
multibuttontoken_deletebody: Are you sure you wish to delete this registration token?
multibuttontoken_modalbody: Modify this token data and then press Save.
multibuttontoken_unblockbody: Are you sure you wish to unblock this Token?
redisConfig_REDIS_PASSWORD_helper: Provide the Redis server password, if any.
redisConfig_REDIS_PORT_helper: Enter the Redis server port (default is 6379).
save_no_collection_error: Cannot save: No collection is selected.
scheduler_body: Set a date and time to publish this entry.
set_status_no_selection_error: Cannot change status: No entry is selected.
setup_db_test_missing_credentials: Missing database credentials: please provide user and password
setup_db_test_class_authentication_faile: Authentication failed: verify username & password, and user has access to the database.
setup_db_test_class_not_authorized: User connected but is not authorized for requested database/operation.
setup_db_test_class_connection_refused: Connection refused: server not reachable on host/port or MongoDB not running.
setup_db_test_class_dns_not_found: Host name not found (DNS). Check spelling or network configuration.
setup_db_test_class_timeout: Server selection timeout: instance not reachable or blocked by firewall.
setup_db_test_class_tls_error: TLS/SSL handshake failed: certificate or protocol issue.
setup_db_test_class_invalid_uri: Invalid MongoDB URI/host. Ensure it starts with mongodb:// or mongodb+srv:// and is correctly formatted.
setup_db_test_class_unknown: Unknown connection error. See raw error below.
setup_help_admin_confirm_password: Re-enter the password to confirm there are no typos. Must match exactly.
setup_help_admin_email: Used for password recovery and system notifications. Must be valid.
setup_help_admin_password: Choose a strong password. Minimum 8 chars including letters, numbers & special characters. Do not reuse old passwords.
setup_help_admin_password_requirements_a: This account will have full administrative privileges
setup_help_admin_password_requirements_l: At least one letter (A-Z or a-z)
setup_help_admin_username: Unique login name for the administrator account. Can be changed later.
setup_help_content_languages: Languages available for authoring content. Can include experimental or partially translated locales.
setup_help_database_host: Hostname or IP address where the database server is reachable.
setup_help_database_name: Name of the database/schema to use or create.
setup_help_database_password: Password for the database user. Store securely; not shown in logs.
setup_help_database_port: Network port the database server listens on. Defaults vary by engine.
setup_help_database_type: Select the database engine to use. Ensure the server & driver are installed.
setup_help_database_user: Database user with rights to create tables and read/write data.
setup_help_default_content_language: Primary language for content entries and fallbacks when translations are missing.
setup_help_default_system_language: Primary interface language used for menus, messages and administration.
setup_help_media_path: Relative path for storing uploaded media files. Must be writable by the server process. Example: ./mediaFolder
setup_help_site_name: Public facing name of your site. Appears in titles and navigation.
setup_help_system_languages: All interface languages users can switch the admin UI to. Include default plus any additional fully translated sets.
setup_note_add_codes_default_cannot_be_r: Add existing or custom codes. Default cannot be removed.
setup_review_intro: Please review your configuration before completing the setup. Once finished, you'll be redirected to the login page.
setup_database_intro: Enter your database connection details. SveltyCMS supports MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and MySQL databases.
setup_heading_subtitle: Configure your content management system in a few simple steps
setup_language_description: This language will be used for the setup interface. You can configure your site's content languages later in the setup process.
setup_language_subtitle: Choose your preferred language to continue with the setup process
signin_emailnotfound: No account found with this email address.
signin_forgottontoast: Password reset instructions sent to your email
signin_forgottenpasswordtext: Do not worry. We will help you Recover your Password.
forgottenpassword_ignore: If you didn't request this, please ignore this email.
updatedpassword_contact: If you have any questions, please contact us.
welcomeuser_discussion1: Join our community discussions on GitHub
welcomeuser_discussion2: to get help, share ideas, and connect with other developers.
signin_restpasswordtoast: Password reset token was also send by Email
signin_signup_first_admin: Please sign up to create the first admin account.
status_reserved_for_system: This status is reserved for system use.
systemConfig_HOST_DEV_helper: Hostname for the site in development (default: 'http://localhost:5173').
systemConfig_HOST_PROD_helper: Hostname for the site in production (default: 'https://yourdomain.de').
systemConfig_USE_SEASON_helper: Enable or disable seasonal decorations (default: false).
tiktokConfig_USE_TIKTOK_helper: Enable or disable TikTok API integration.
unsaved_changes_body: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?
uploadMedia_Document_Text: An uploaded file or document, such as a PDF.
uploadMedia_Image_Text: Use local images for reusable media.
uploadMedia_RemoteVideo_Text: A remotely hosted video from YouTube or Vimeo.
usermodalconfirmbody: This cannot be undone. Are you sure you wish to proceed?
usermodaluser_editbody: Modify your data and then press Save.
usermodaluser_settingbody: Upload a new avatar image and then press Save.
validation_fix_before_save: Please fix validation errors before saving.
widget_ImageUpload_Allowed: PNG, JPG, GIF, WEBP, AVIF, and SVG allowed
widget_ImageUpload_description: This ImageUpload widget lets users upload and manage image files with optional watermarking and metadata.
widget_checkbox_description: This widget lets you create a checkbox that users can select or deselect. You can customize the label, color, and size of the checkbox. Use this widget to add interactivity and collect feedback from your users
widget_colorPicker_description: This Color Picker widget provides an easy way for users to select a color. Use it to add interactivity and collect user input.
widget_currency_description: This Currency widget enables the collection of user currency data for purposes such as payments, exchange rates, and transactions.
widget_dateRange_description: This DateRange widget enables the collection of user date and time data for purposes such as appointments, reminders, and events.
widget_DateTime_description: This DateTime widget enables the collection of user date and time data for purposes such as appointments, reminders, and events.
widget_date_description: This Date widget enables the collection of user date data for purposes such as birthdays, registrations, and feedback.
widget_email_description: This Email widget enables the collection of user email addresses for purposes such as newsletters, registrations, and feedback.
widget_fileUpload_description: This FileUpload widget enables the collection of user file data for purposes such as files, images, and documents.
widget_megaMenu_description: This MegaMenu widget allows multilevel menus for navigation.
widget_number_description: This Number widget enables the collection of user number data for purposes such as appointments, reminders, and events.
widget_phoneNumber_description: This PhoneNumber widget enables the collection of user phone numbers for purposes such as phone calls, SMS, and WhatsApp.
widget_radio_description: This Radio widget enables the collection of user radio data for purposes such as appointments, reminders, and events.
widget_rating_description: This Rating widget enables the collection of user rating data for purposes such as feedback, reviews, and ratings.
widget_relation_description: This Relation widget lets you link entries from another collection to reference related content.
widget_remoteVideo_description: This RemoteVideo widget enables the collection of user video data for purposes such as appointments, reminders, and events.
widget_richtText_description: This RichText widget is used to create rich text content. You can customize the label, color, and size of the text. Use this widget to add interactivity and collect feedback from your users.
widget_seo_description: This SEO widget enables the collection of user SEO data for purposes such as search engine optimization (SEO), social media, and advertising.
widget_seo_suggestionctakeywordsdescript: Your description uses the CTA keyword. Perfect!
widget_seo_suggestionctakeywordstitle: Your title has the CTA keyword. Perfect!
widget_seo_suggestiondescriptionbad: Your description is less than 90 characters. Bad!
widget_seo_suggestiondescriptiongood: Your description is more than 90 characters. Good!
widget_seo_suggestiondescriptionperfect: Your description is between 120 and 165 characters. Perfect!
widget_seo_suggestionnumberbad: Your title does not use numbers. The use of numbers in your title can increase your CTR.
widget_seo_suggestionsentencebad: Your description is only 1 sentence long. Make sure your description is 2 to 4 sentences long.
widget_seo_suggestionsentencegood: Your description is 2 to 4 sentences long but not all sentences are between 10 and 30 characters. Good!
widget_seo_suggestionsentenceperfect: Your description is 2 to 4 sentences long. Perfect!
widget_seo_suggestiontext: Optimize title & description for Google search results to improve visual appeal and drive more clicks to your website.
widget_seo_suggestiontitlebad: Your title is too short. Make sure your title is at least 50 characters. Bad!
widget_seo_suggestiontitlegood: Your title is more than 30 characters. Try 50+. Good!
widget_seo_suggestiontitleperfect: Your title is more than 50 characters. Perfect!
widget_seo_suggestionpowerworddescriptio: Your description uses the Power Word. Perfect!
widget_seo_suggestionpowerwordtitle: Your title has the Power Word. Perfect!
widget_text_description: This Text widget enables the collection of user text data for purposes such as blog posts, comments, and feedback.
widgets_required_by_collections: The following widgets are required by your collections
entrylist_dnd: Drag & Drop Columns / Click to hide
entrylist_body: Are you sure you want to {status} the selected entries?
twofa_success_enabled: Two-factor authentication has been successfully enabled
twofa_error_already_enabled: 2FA is already enabled for this account
twofa_error_not_enabled: 2FA is not enabled for this account
twofa_error_setup_failed: Failed to set up 2FA. Please try again.
twofa_description: Add an extra layer of security to your account by requiring a verification code from your mobile device.
twofa_setup_info_description: You'll need an authenticator app like Google Authenticator, Authy, or 1Password.
twofa_setup_step_1: Scan the QR code with your authenticator app
twofa_setup_step_2: Enter the 6-digit code from your app to verify
twofa_setup_step_3: Save your backup codes in a secure location
twofa_enabled_description: Your account is protected by 2FA. You'll need your authenticator app or a backup code to sign in.
twofa_backup_codes_description: Store these codes in a safe place. Each code can only be used once.
twofa_backup_codes_save_description: Save these backup codes in a secure location. You can use them to access your account if you lose your authenticator device.
twofa_backup_codes_warning: Keep these codes secure! Anyone with access to them can bypass your 2FA.
twofa_setup_scan_description: Use your authenticator app to scan this QR code:
twofa_manual_entry_description: If you can't scan the QR code, enter this key manually in your authenticator app:
twofa_verify_setup_description: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app to complete setup:
twofa_setup_complete_description: Two-factor authentication has been successfully enabled for your account.
twofa_verify_description: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app to verify your identity.
twofa_disable_verify_description: Enter your authentication code to disable 2FA:
twofa_help_authenticator: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
twofa_help_backup: Enter one of your 8-character backup codes
